about_the_game:
Chinese gaming club is a simulation adventure game. Player acts as a founder of an esports club that make their way from a local small club to the best gaming club of the world. 

 The game has rich story line and plentiful of characters。During the development of the game, player gets a chance to explore different parts of China and trigger different storylines.  

In different parts of China, player undergo different adventures and challenge different mini-games.  Once players overcome different adventures, they will obtain different skills that help them become better esports players that can defeat stronger opponents.

During match day, player fights stronger and stronger enmies, player will enhance their capabilities and eventually make their way to the highest league of the world. 

Different fighting system will be available throughout the game. Player will experince diffferent type of fighting and defeat a variety of characters.

As a simulation game, business money management content is also available. The game club will start earning income after chapter two of the storyline.  Two shops will be unlocked. Players will make careful decisions regarding how to use their money effectively to enhance their players as well as make the club financially healthy.

The game is very rich in storyline, through out the game, players will walk through tens of chapters of stories. Hidden chapters can be triggered through completing difficult adventures.

In chapter 4, players will also represent their country to national gaming competitions. They will not only win glory for their club but their nation as well.

during branch of the storyline,  protagonists of the game will meet and talk with successful people of all fields including other esports players, famous atheletes and successful bussiness men. These adventures will enhance statistics of players and add incomes to the club make players stronger and the club more successful.

Through hours of hard work, player will conquer many gaming leagues and eventually win the biggest gaming match of the world.
detailed_description:
Chinese gaming club is a simulation adventure game. Player acts as a founder of an esports club that make their way from a local small club to the best gaming club of the world. 

 The game has rich story line and plentiful of characters。During the development of the game, player gets a chance to explore different parts of China and trigger different storylines.  

In different parts of China, player undergo different adventures and challenge different mini-games.  Once players overcome different adventures, they will obtain different skills that help them become better esports players that can defeat stronger opponents.

During match day, player fights stronger and stronger enmies, player will enhance their capabilities and eventually make their way to the highest league of the world. 

Different fighting system will be available throughout the game. Player will experince diffferent type of fighting and defeat a variety of characters.

As a simulation game, business money management content is also available. The game club will start earning income after chapter two of the storyline.  Two shops will be unlocked. Players will make careful decisions regarding how to use their money effectively to enhance their players as well as make the club financially healthy.

The game is very rich in storyline, through out the game, players will walk through tens of chapters of stories. Hidden chapters can be triggered through completing difficult adventures.

In chapter 4, players will also represent their country to national gaming competitions. They will not only win glory for their club but their nation as well.

during branch of the storyline,  protagonists of the game will meet and talk with successful people of all fields including other esports players, famous atheletes and successful bussiness men. These adventures will enhance statistics of players and add incomes to the club make players stronger and the club more successful.

Through hours of hard work, player will conquer many gaming leagues and eventually win the biggest gaming match of the world.
name: 中国式战队
short_description: 中国式战队是一款剧情丰富的养成类游戏。玩家将扮演一名战队老板，带领五名队员从网吧比赛一路征战到世界冠军。本游戏剧情丰富，有很多搞笑情节。
